If its Ant plugin is so nice, why is it that it can't run any of my ant 
scripts :( Does anyone know what version of Ant it uses?  I also HATE the 
cvs client, it sure looks great, but in order to just commit it sat there 
for ages cheking every single file if they needed to be updated.  Tookway 
too much time :(

Mark

--On Tuesday, December 18, 2001 07:13:18 -0800 Joshua Kerievsky 
<jlk@...> wrote:

> I'm not, but I've seen it done. In addition, a new version of Eclipse
> (http://www.eclipse.org), which is the successor to VisualAge, has a nice
> Ant plug-in.
